column4: if i install kubuntu-desktop would i get the exact same thing as if i downloaded the Kubuntu live cd?
basically, but to get exactly the same as the kubuntu liveCD you;d have to uninstall the gnome stuff
and after uninstalling the gnome stuff would there be all kind of config files, settins wandering througout my /home folder? i dont think that comes with the live cd
some will be but they are just small dot files
